name: Danmaku Issho
description:
*****BUG: The last boss does not spawn, so the last level just goes on forever.  Sorry!

A vertically-scrolling shooter in which you play as two ships that can join together as one!  Join and split dynamically through 3 fun and fast paced levels.

Instructions given in game.

Esc to close.

Programming: Jackson Sweet

Art & Design: Sam Martin, Joey Ganisin

Music:

"Rocket" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
